meanings.sent2: The factory produces cars every day.
meanings.sent3: The magician produces a rabbit out of a hat.
meanings.sent4: Her hard work produces success like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The sun produces light and warmth for the Earth.

meanings.sent1: The apple tree produces juicy fruits in the fall.
meanings.sent2: The farm produces fresh vegetables for the market.
meanings.sent3: The hen produces an egg every morning like clockwork.
meanings.sent4: His dedication produces results beyond expectations.
meanings.sent5: The rain produces a rainbow in the sky after a storm.

meanings.sent1: The loud noise produces fear in the animals.
meanings.sent2: The experiment produces interesting data for analysis.
meanings.sent3: The comedian produces laughter with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness produces smiles wherever she goes.
meanings.sent5: The wind produces waves on the surface of the water.
